timeline.message: Check for positive question score (server sided)
Check for positive question score (user interface)
Add german translation for user interface hint (#1393)

timeline.bodyText: What about multiple whitespaces. You should maybe trim the string before you do the validation. Could be also a problem in the frontend. Please check this! 💯
timeline.author: stefanwaldhauser

replies.bodyText:
I do agree on that, but since the related issue #1393 refers to the non-positive number score I didn't want to change too much here - only the things related to the issue.
I think it would make more sense to create a new issue regarding this (the title).
If it referred to getScore(), getScore() returns an Integer.
replies.author: FlorianGlombik

timeline.author: krusche
